body_html:
@caisq thanks ! This solved the problem for me.

The leak was happening while using 361.42 from Ubuntu 16.04 official repository.
I've run apt-get purge nvidia-* then installed 367.27 from a PPA.
The memory consumption went down from 16+GB to around 6 GB which is now correctly released when exiting the process.

body:
@caisq thanks ! This solved the problem for me.

The leak was happening while using 361.42 from Ubuntu 16.04 official repository.
I've run `apt-get purge nvidia-*` then installed 367.27 from a [PPA](https://launchpad.net/~graphics-drivers/+archive/ubuntu/ppa).
The memory consumption went down from 16+GB to around 6 GB which is now correctly released when exiting the process.
